import PropTypes from '../../components/PropTypes';
import Theme from '../../components/Theme';
import { InlineFlex } from 'fannypack/InlineFlex/InlineFlex';

# InlineFlex

```js
import { InlineFlex } from 'fannypack';
```

By default it renders a `<Box>` component with `display: inline-flex`.

```jsx-live
<InlineFlex>This is an inline flex</InlineFlex>
```

## InlineFlex Props

<!-- Automatically generated -->

**`overrides`**

```
{ base?: any; }
```

</details>

        

## Theming

<Theme component={InlineFlex} overrides={['InlineFlex.base']}>This is an inline flex</Theme>
